short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random groups from an Excel or CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows mixing groups of people from lists in CSV or Excel format. The user can set the number of people per group or the total number of groups. The algorithm automatically distributes the people, and the groups can be exported as a CSV file.
